``requires group`` allows previous and next methods to cycle through matching elements. (global variable or constant)
``requires group``enables controllable elements when a collection is active. (global variable or constant)
``requires keys`` enables key control for ``close``, ``next`` and ``previous``. (global variable or constant)
``requires modal`` allows the dimmer to be closed onclick. (global variable or constant)
``requires modalClickable`` disables all close events, lightbox can be only closed using the API. (global variable or constant)

A

adds jquery style css object to gallery content element. (global variable or constant)
ajax loads the provided url and tries to inject the html into the lightbox. It does not create an iframe in order to maintain the css style. (global variable or constant)
ajax: false (global variable or constant)
allows grouping of matching elements and enables status and navigation. (global variable or constant)
